monogr.title: A reproofe, spoken and geeuen-fourth by Abia Nazarenus, against all false Christians, seducing ypocrites [sic], and enemies of the trueth and loue. Wher-withall their false deuices, punnishment, and condemnation ṫogether with the conuersion from their abhominations and their preseruation in the godlynes, is figured-fourth before their eyes. Translated out of Nether-Saxon
monogr.author: Abia, nazarenus

div.head: An Epistle writen and sent vnto the Communialtie of Loue, by the chosen Minister in thesame.

15. BEhold, my Beloued: This is my frin • lie Exhortatiō vnto you, that yee wi •

16. But if the Blaspheamers will not leaue •
